mapper.select: SELECT r.review_no AS reviewNo, r.review_title AS reviewTitle, r.review_content AS reviewContent, p.program_name AS programName, pm.customer_id AS customerId, r.createdate FROM review r INNER JOIN program_reservation pr ON r.program_reservation_no = pr.program_reservation_no INNER JOIN payment pm ON pr.payment_no = pm.payment_no INNER JOIN program_date pd ON pr.program_date_no = pd.program_date_no INNER JOIN program p ON pd.program_no = p.program_no
SELECT review_no reviewNo, review_reply_content reviewReplyContent, employee_id employeeId, createdate FROM review_reply
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review( program_reservation_no, review_title, review_content, createdate, updatedate ) VALUES ( #{programReservationNo}, #{reviewTitle}, #{reviewContent}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT p.program_name programName, b.branch_name branchName, pd.program_date programDate FROM program_reservation pr INNER JOIN program_date pd ON pr.program_date_no = pd.program_date_no INNER JOIN program p ON pd.program_no = p.program_no INNER JOIN branch b ON pr.branch_no = b.branch_no WHERE pr.program_reservation_no = #{programReservationNo}

SELECT r.review_no reviewNo, r.review_title reviewTitle, p.program_name programName, pm.customer_id customerId, r.createdate FROM review r INNER JOIN program_reservation pr ON r.program_reservation_no = pr.program_reservation_no INNER JOIN payment pm ON pr.payment_no = pm.payment_no INNER JOIN program_date pd ON pr.program_date_no = pd.program_date_no INNER JOIN program p ON pd.program_no = p.program_no ORDER BY r.review_no DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT r.review_title reviewTitle, r.review_content reviewContent, r.createdate createdate, p.customer_id customerId FROM review r INNER JOIN program_reservation pr ON r.program_reservation_no = pr.program_reservation_no INNER JOIN payment p ON pr.payment_no = p.payment_no WHERE r.review_no = #{reviewNo}

SELECT r.review_no reviewNo, r.review_title reviewTitle, r.review_content reviewContent, r.createdate, pg.program_name programName FROM review r INNER JOIN program_reservation pr ON r.program_reservation_no = pr.program_reservation_no INNER JOIN payment p ON pr.payment_no = p.payment_no INNER JOIN customer c ON p.customer_id = c.customer_id INNER JOIN program_date pd ON pr.program_date_no = pd.program_date_no INNER JOIN program pg ON pd.program_no = pg.program_no WHERE c.customer_no = #{customerNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET review_title = #{reviewTitle}, review_content = #{reviewContent}, updatedate = NOW() WHERE review_no = #{reviewNo}
mapper.select: SELECT r.review_no reviewNo, r.review_title reviewTitle, r.review_content reviewContent, r.createdate createdate, pg.program_name programName, pg.employee_id employeeId, b.branch_name branchName, pd.program_date programDate FROM review r INNER JOIN program_reservation pr ON r.program_reservation_no = pr.program_reservation_no INNER JOIN program_date pd ON pr.program_date_no = pd.program_date_no INNER JOIN program pg ON pd.program_no = pg.program_no INNER JOIN employee e ON pg.employee_id = e.employee_id INNER JOIN branch b ON e.branch_no = b.branch_no WHERE r.review_no = #{reviewNo}
